Constructor Detail

MovingAverageTest.GraphPanel

public MovingAverageTest.GraphPanel()
The graph of this test's statistics. By default, the graph number is reset.

MovingAverageTest.GraphPanel

public MovingAverageTest.GraphPanel(boolean resetCount)
The graph of this test's statistics. If the resetCount parameter is set to false, then this graph is a subsequent graph and is overlaid on the prior graphs.

Parameters:
resetCount - false indicates a subsequent graph to the first
